Hello, I'm Americo Ortega,

I help developers to improve their skills while creating quality products.

I'm a Full-stack JavaScript Developer from Bolivia living in Sweden. Organizer of CSS Community Dev, and CSS Conf BOlivia. Google Developer Expert, Auth0 Ambassador, and Twitch Partner.
